app_descript:
Brief: Karrot brings local buying and selling to your fingertips. This app provides a platform for community members to engage in transactions without the hassle of shipping, by connecting you with neighbors and trusted local buyers and sellers. It prides itself on a swift listing process, robust safety features, and a system dedicated to keeping the marketplace professional-free.

Please note that all interactions within the app should adhere to the terms of service specified by Karrot as well as the community guidelines.
